name: Brick Game Pac-Man
description:
Inspired on the classic Pac-Man game with the old brick game design, I made this version as a way to test and improve my skills with gaming development on Java platform.

The gameplay is very simple: get all the point arround the map and evade being touched by the phantoms. When you collect every point in the map you can go to the next level.

Actualy the game has a menu, levels, and game over systems allready finished, and some other mechanichs witch i'm thinking add in future builds such as difficult level.

During the early access phase, i'm publishing some builds for free (but you can donate if you wish, I won't get mad)  for people to test and give feedback. When the project is concluded it will be available for purchase for the minimum price.
